headers.subject: [tosdr:2042] No nudity is allowed on Microsoft Services

html:
Applies to outlook.com skydrive.com, live.com, account.live.com, profile.microsoft.com, msn.com, bing.com, office.com, Windows Photo Gallery, Windows Movie Maker, Microsoft Mail, Windows Live Writer and "other Microsoft Services" that link to these terms (oddly enough Microsoft.com has a different ToS).


This would supposedly even include private libraries. In short, no storing porn on SkyDrive.


You will not upload, post, transmit, transfer, distribute or facilitate distribution of any content (including text, images, sound, video, data, information or software) or otherwise use the service in a way that:

  • depicts nudity of any sort including full or partial human nudity or nudity in non-human forms such as cartoons, fantasy art or manga.

 

From <http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/windows-live/code-of-conduct> 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
---

subject: No nudity is allowed on Microsoft Services
text:
Applies to outlook.com skydrive.com, live.com, account.live.com, 
profile.microsoft.com, msn.com, bing.com, office.com, Windows Photo 
Gallery, Windows Movie Maker, Microsoft Mail, Windows Live Writer and 
"other Microsoft Services" that link to these terms (oddly enough 
Microsoft.com has a different ToS).


This would supposedly even include private libraries. In short, no storing 
porn on SkyDrive.


You will not upload, post, transmit, transfer, distribute or facilitate 
distribution of any content (including text, images, sound, video, data, 
information or software) or otherwise use the service in a way that:

   - depicts nudity of any sort including full or partial human nudity or 
   nudity in non-human forms such as cartoons, fantasy art or manga. 

 

From <http://windows.microsoft.com/en-US/windows-live/code-of-conduct> 

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
